channel.title: Shader Graph on Cyanilux
channel.description: Recent content in Shader Graph on Cyanilux

item.title: Local UVs for Sprites in Sprite Sheet/Atlas
item.description: A small post explaining how to convert the UVs of a sprite sheet (or sprites packed in an atlas) into local 0-1 coordinates across each sprite in the shader

item.title: Ultraviolet Lights & Invisible Ink
item.description: Examples for revealing invisible objects (especially decals, such as fingerprints or hidden messages) based on lights, stencils and other masking methods

item.title: Book (w/ Turnable Pages) Breakdown
item.description: A book with pages that flip/turn via vertex displacement, and selects a portion of a texture containing all pages.

item.title: Rain Effects Breakdown
item.description: A few rain effects, including particles setup, and shaders for ripples in water/puddles and rain interacting with surfaces

item.title: Waterfall Shader Breakdown
item.description: A waterfall shader that interacts with a sphere to part the flowing water. Uses a signed distance field and alpha clipping.

item.title: Fractured Cube Breakdown
item.description: Uses a shader which displaces (scales/rotates) vertices of a prefractured mesh with pivots baked into UV maps

item.title: Swapping Colours
item.description: Examples of how to adjust/swap colours or colour palettes for a given texture/procedural input.

item.title: Snowglobe Breakdown
item.description: Glass globe shader with background refraction & reflection. Particles are contained inside which inherit Rigidbody movements.

item.title: Tentacle Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader that uses vertex displacement to simulate a tentacle grabbing / wrapping around an object

item.title: Tornado Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader applied to a few layers of alpha-clipped scrolling noise, with vertex displacement to make it wobble

item.title: Sword Slash Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader applied to a ring mesh that pans a texture along it to create a swipe/slash effect

item.title: Holofoil Card Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader that replicates the Holographic Foil effects on Trading Cards. Also explains the stencil shader effect on the card window.

item.title: Soft Foliage Shader Breakdown
item.description: Soft shaded foliage shader that uses alpha clipping with foliage texture and a small amount of vertex displacement to simulate wind. Applied to a mesh consisting of intersecting quads generated from a particle system

item.title: Intro to Shader Graph
item.description: A detailed introduction on how to use Unity Shader Graph (updated for v12+)! Graph setup, Data types, Understanding Previews, Properties, Keywords, Sub Graphs and more!

item.title: Crystal Shader Breakdown
item.description: An unlit/glowing crystal shader with a colour gradient based on object space Y position, and refraction via Scene Color node

item.title: Depth
item.description: A big post explaining everything about Depth : Depth Buffer, Depth Texture / Scene Depth node, SV_Depth, Reconstructing World Position from Depth, etc.

item.title: Fire/Flame Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader which distorts the UVs with noise for sampling a fire texture or shape generated using ellipse nodes

item.title: Sprite Glow/Outline Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader which uses a signed distance field stored in the sprite texture's alpha channel to create an outline/glow (and inner-glow) effect, with control over the colour and thickness

item.title: Sprite Stencil Overlay Breakdown
item.description: An example of using the RenderObjects feature on the Forward Renderer to produce an overlay effect for sprites (not compatible with the 2D renderer)

item.title: Dissolve Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader which uses noise and step functions to discard pixels to create a dissolving effect. Also provides examples for dissolving based on height / Y and using view space position as UVs to avoid seams

item.title: Toon Glass Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader which produces solid diagonal lines across a quad's surface that moves with the camera position to simulate toon-like glass reflections

item.title: Fog Plane Shader Breakdown
item.description: Two examples of vertical fog effects produced using the depth texture (scene depth)

item.title: Cloud Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader applied to a flat subdivided plane where vertices are offset vertically based on layered noise, moving at different rates, to create a cloud effect. Also uses scene depth to produce a softer transition with intersecting game objects

item.title: Forcefield Shader Breakdown
item.description: A forcefield shader using fresnel effect for glowing edges, scene depth for object intersections and scene colour to produce ripples/distortion

item.title: Forcefield Shader Breakdown (Simple)
item.description: A simple version of a forcefield shader, using fresnel effect for glowing edges and scene depth for intersections with objects in the scene

item.title: Jellyfish Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader that displaces vertices based on sine waves in order to animate a Jellyfish mesh

item.title: Vertex Displacement
item.description: A post explaining how to move vertices in Shader Graph, providing examples such as swaying grass and animated fish and butterflies. Also includes info about recalculating normal vectors.

item.title: Water Shader Breakdown
item.description: A water shader that uses the scene color to produce distortion/refractions and reconstructs a position from the scene depth to project caustics on underwater objects

item.title: Whirlpool Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader that uses polar coordinates to offset vertices as well as sample a seamless noise texture to create a swirling effect

item.title: Hologram Shader Breakdown
item.description: A hologram shader based on sine/fraction nodes to produce repeating horizontal lines and fresnel effect, with optional distortion and glitching effects

item.title: Polar Coordinates
item.description: A post explaining the Polar Coordinates node

item.title: Portal Shader Breakdown
item.description: A portal/wormhole shader on manipulating polar coordinates to create a spiralling effect

item.title: Liquid Shader Breakdown
item.description: A shader that discards pixels above a certain Y position and renders back faces to fake the top surface of the liquid
